sentence.text: That piece of information shook her so much that she put up no resistance to being led off , except to say , ` Where are we going ? "
It certainly shook me when you came downstairs , but then I just thought my people might be away , and have let the cottage .
It rather shook me when I discovered I was pregnant by you . "
He screamed again , a sound of primal fear that shook the others who heard it .
She had just stood there , scarcely able to breathe , and aware that only a hair 's breadth of control separated her from a fury that would shake her to her soul .
This notion shook me to my roots -- I 'd mess up my new safety boots , And what about the donkey jacket ?
The answer shook Maggie to the core .
Desire shook her to the very foundations of her being .
He has a stare that can fill a man with dread -- a quiet , almost contemptuous look which shakes you to your boots .
When I eventually arrived at the hospital I was feeling in the best of spirits and apparently shook the sisters by asking them to bring on the dancing girls . "
Officials said that President de Klerk was severely shaken by his meetings with Mrs Thatcher and Sir Geoffrey Howe , then Foreign Secretary .
The nation is profoundly shaken by the defeat of our troops at Stalingrad .
Wordsworth lived by his beliefs for eight years , but in 1805 he was so shaken by the death of his brother John that his self-sufficiency collapsed .
She was still confused and shaken by the day 's events .
Mr. Hallworth was considerably shaken by the scene and finally said , ` All right .
Some said the king was gravely shaken by his narrow escape from death , and the implied threat that still hung over him .
She was very badly shaken and may never go out alone because of her ordeal .
Gilberto 's next words had shaken Zen more than anything that had happened so far .
With Chrissie so shaken up , it would be good to have a second voice in the Stones ' house that could exert some control over the eleven-year-old .
He 'd shaken up Evans , first bawling him out then ending up with a show of confidence in him with the Havana .
Test blasts shake up residents
That 's shaken them up a bit , I expect . "
It shook me up the way the split was done for the 1990 US Open .
